ygData.subject: RE: Charred Guardian Shield and Shining Star
ygData.msgSnippet: One quick question about the quest.  It starts in Qeynos clerics guild? Last time I went there they wouldnt allow to train me because I am a High elf.  Guess
ygData.messageBody:
One quick question about the quest. It starts in Qeynos clerics guild?
Last time I went there they wouldnt allow to train me because I am a High
elf. Guess they are jelouse of me. Also what are the stats of this weapon
thanks.

Qanin Skywanderer
22nd Circle


-----Original Message-----
From: Azor [mailto:jmaynus@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 4:19 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Charred Guardian Shield and Shining Star


From: "Azor" <jmaynus@...>

I did the Shining Star quest today, kinda a pain in the butt but it's kinda
easy. I did notice when you get it the guy calls it the Shining Star of
Life but if you right click it it's call Shining Star of Light. Believe me
ppl the quest isn't hard at all but it can take you a while to finish it.

**************************
Azor
Lvl 18 Human Cleric of The Rathe
**************************
